stats.api.util

Class Statistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • stats.api.util.Statistic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxScore, CombineSummary, Dashboard, DrillResults, LeagueGameLog, LeagueLeaders, LeagueLeadersTiles, LeagueLineups, PlayByPlay, PlayerCareer, PlayerGameLog, PlayerList, PlayerStats, PlayerSummary, PlayerTracking, PlayerVsPlayer, Scoreboard, ShotChart, SpotShooting, TeamDetails, TeamGameLog, TeamLineups, TeamList, TeamRoster, TeamSeasons, TeamSummary, TeamVsPlayer

    public class Statistic
extends java.lang.Object
    A Statistic is the data receieved from the NBA Stats API by requesting a specific endpoint with specific fields. The data comprises of various tables which are represented via statItems, a List of StatItem.

    It holds all the essential information required to make a request to the API. It adds all the default values for fields not provided by the user. It loads the data from the API, processes the JSON that is returned and parses it to produce a list of StatItem objects. It also has the original json dump. It also has functionality to print the data on the provided PrintStream.

    Clients do not usually deal with this class directly. This class is extended by all the other classes that represent different data endpoints.

    Author:
    nikhilsaraf

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistic

        public Statistic(java.lang.String endpoint,
                 java.util.Map<FieldType,java.lang.Object> fields,
                 FieldType[] required_fields)
        Class Constructor. Creates a new Statistic object, with the information to load the data from the API. Establishes the api_endpoint and calls the fixFields method. Saves the list of required fields with the associated endpoint, to make a successful request.

        This constructor does not load the data automatically. Remember to call the load method before trying to access any of the data.

        Parameters:
        endpoint - string representing the endpoint to request the API with
        fields - map of FieldType-Object representing the fields(params) to request the api with
        required_fields - list of FieldType which are required to make successful request for the given endpoint
